channel.title: Smh, RSCR owner still an idiot
channel.description:
So I played his server for about a week thinking he changed for the better from his scamming and idiot actions in the past...
Guess not.
[img]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/8452/98971117.png[/img]

item.title: Smh, RSCR owner still an idiot
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Oh well. RSCR was blocked a longggg time ago, and it’s not going to change.

Read full topic

item.source: Smh, RSCR owner still an idiot

item.title: Smh, RSCR owner still an idiot
item.dc:creator: @imabeast imabeast
item.description:
@imabeast wrote:

I got ratted like 2 months ago lol… I didn’t say RSCE owner ratted me either, I found the guy who ratted me before, I’m not an idiot and it’ easily traceable. My computer was reformated, ip address changed etc. I play keiths server for a week and my CC gets hacked after hes done the same shit in the past? LOL pretty obvious, being RAT’ed doesn’t mean you’re an idiot btw, I love play RSC servers and I figured it was legit with all the positive reviews, I guess it’s true… people don’t change.

Read full topic
item.source: Smh, RSCR owner still an idiot

item.title: Smh, RSCR owner still an idiot
item.dc:creator: @The_Boss2 The_Boss
item.description:
@The_Boss2 wrote:

Yes ^ Proof or GTFO. Obviously your retarded, you got RATTED a couple weeks back and now it’s the RSCR owner, your picture proves nothing. So unless you post some definitive proof that Keith is the one who got your card info you shutup. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Smh, RSCR owner still an idiot

item.title: Smh, RSCR owner still an idiot
item.dc:creator: @imabeast imabeast
item.description:
@imabeast wrote:

[quote=“Xazer, post:19, topic:442068”][quote author=imabeast link=topic=544720.msg3993992#msg3993992 date=1337016859]

i don’t get it…

RSCR server has a keylogger in it, stole my credit card info when I used it online

Do you have proof that it was due to RSCR? Yes, you did mention that it was the only game you downloaded but how are you 100% sure it was from RSCR?

Research the owners past… all he does is infect people with viruses for his own benefit

@jumphim, I suggest getting all new cards and reformatting, if you don’t, don’t complain later on
[/quote]

Proof or gtfo. You made a post complaining about being ratted not that long ago so your obviously an idiot. Stop making up B.S. and get a life.[/quote]

Yep this is true, sadly because that is what most of the RSC population does now a days.

Read full topic
